subject: Re: Customize Parameterized class report?
msgSnippet: Thanks David. I didn t found the patch yet but I solved it that way: I copied the sourcecode of Parameterized.java and changed only this line of code: return
messageBody:
Thanks David.

I didn't found the patch yet but I solved it that way:

I copied the sourcecode of Parameterized.java and changed only this
line of code:


return String.format("[%s]", fParameterSetNumber);

into this one

return String.format("[%s] - %s", fParameterSetNumber, fParameters
[fParameters.length - 1].toString());

And I used my new Runner instead of Parameterized.class
That means the last Parameter on each TestCase is the name.
